shareableLinkCopied: Shareable link copied to the clipboard. Click here to view the screenshot.
errorwhileTakingScreenshot: An error occurred while taking the screenshot.
clickToOpenLogs: Click here to open the logs.

polkitDialog.title: Polkit not found
polkitDialog.message: IPFS can't be added to /usr/local/bin/ without polkit agent.

noPermissionDialog.title: No permission
noPermissionDialog.message: IPFS couldn't be added to /usr/local/bin/, either because you entered the wrong password, or you denied permission.

ipfsNotRunningDialog.title: IPFS is not running
ipfsNotRunningDialog.message: IPFS needs to be running to perform this action. Do you want to start the daemon?

recoverableErrorDialog.title: An error has occurred
recoverableErrorDialog.message: An error occurred but it does not prevent the execution of GAWOO. You can either inspect the logs for yourself or report the error to the developers.

cannotConnectToApiDialog.title: Cannot connect to API
cannotConnectToApiDialog.message: GAWOO cannot connect to the API address provided: { addr }.

gawooHasShutdownDialog.title: GAWOO has shutdown
gawooHasShutdownDialog.message: GAWOO has shutdown because of an error. You can restart the app or report the error to the developers, which requires a GitHub account.

moveRepositoryWarnDialog.title: Move repository
moveRepositoryWarnDialog.message: If your repository is taking too much space on your main drive, you can move it to some other location. Bear in mind that the new location must always be available in order for GAWOO to work correctly.

moveRepositorySuccessDialog.title: Repository moved successfully
moveRepositorySuccessDialog.message: Your repository was successfully moved to { location } and your configuration was updated. The daemon will now start up again.

moveRepositorySameDirDialog.title: Same directory selected
moveRepositorySameDirDialog.message: The directory you picked is the same as the current one: { location }. Hence, no changes will be made.

moveRepositoryDirExists.title: Directory already exists
moveRepositoryDirExists.message: The directory { location } already exists. Please try using a different one.

busyPortsDialog.title: Ports are busy
busyPortsDialog.message: The ports { port1 } and { port2 } are not available. Do you want to use { alt1 } and { alt2 } instead?
busyPortsDialog.action: Use ports { alt1 } and { alt2 } instead

busyPortDialog.title: Port is busy
busyPortDialog.message: The port { port } is not available. Do you want to use { alt } instead?

multipleBusyPortsDialog.title: Ports are busy
multipleBusyPortsDialog.message: Cannot bind to one or more of the API or Gateway addresses because the ports are busy.

itemsAddedNotification.title: Items added
itemsAddedNotification.message: { count } items added to your node. A shareable link was copied to your clipboard. Click here to see your files.

itemAddedNotification.title: Item added
itemAddedNotification.message: Item added to your node. A shareable link was copied to your clipboard. Click here to see your file.

itemsFailedNotification.title: Failed to add items
itemsFailedNotification.message: Could not add your items to your node.

updateAvailableDialog.title: Update available
updateAvailableDialog.message: A new version ({ version }) of GAWOO is available. The download will begin shortly in the background.

updateNotAvailableDialog.title: Update not available
updateNotAvailableDialog.message: You are on the latest version of GAWOO ({ version }).

updateErrorDialog.title: Could not download update
updateErrorDialog.message: It was not possible to download the update. Please check your Internet connection and try again.

updateDownloadedDialog.title: GAWOO Update
updateDownloadedDialog.message: An update to GAWOO { version } is available. Would you like to install it now?

updateDownloadedNotification.title: GAWOO Update
updateDownloadedNotification.message: An update to GAWOO { version } is available.

runGarbageCollectorWarning.title: Garbage collector
runGarbageCollectorWarning.message: Running the garbage collector (GC) will remove from your repository all objects that are not pinned or on your MFS. This may take a while. Do you wish to proceed?

moveRepositoryFailed.title: Move repository
moveRepositoryFailed.message: Could not move the repository from "{ currDir }" to "{ newDir }".

runGarbageCollectorErrored.title: Garbage collector
runGarbageCollectorErrored.message: The garbage collector run could not be completed successfully.

downloadCidContentDialog.title: Download to a local directory
downloadCidContentDialog.message: Enter a CID, IPFS path, or IPNS path:

contentsSavedDialog.title: Success
contentsSavedDialog.message: The contents of "{ path }" were successfully downloaded.

couldNotSaveDialog.title: Could not write to disk
couldNotSaveDialog.message: There was an error writing to "{ dir }": "{ error }". Please try again or inspect logs for more details.

launchAtLoginNotSupported.title: Error
launchAtLoginNotSupported.message: Launch at login is not supported on your platform.

launchAtLoginFailed.title: Error
launchAtLoginFailed.message: Launch at login could not be enabled on your machine.

enableGlobalTakeScreenshotShortcut.title: Enable screenshot shortcut
enableGlobalTakeScreenshotShortcut.message: By enabling this, the shortcut "{ accelerator }" will be available to take screenshots as long as GAWOO is running.

enableGlobalDownloadShortcut.title: Enable download shortcut
enableGlobalDownloadShortcut.message: By enabling this, the shortcut "{ accelerator }" will be available to download files as long as GAWOO is running.

setCustomIpfsBinaryConfirmation.title: Custom IPFS binary
setCustomIpfsBinaryConfirmation.message: By setting a custom IPFS, GAWOO will no longer use the bundled IPFS version and will use the binary you specify. Do you wish to proceed?

setCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.title: Custom IPFS binary
setCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.message: GAWOO will start using the binary located at { path }. To start using it, IPFS needs to be restarted first.

clearCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.title: Clear custom IPFS binary
clearCustomIpfsBinarySuccess.message: The custom IPFS binary was cleared. To start using the bundled IPFS version, IPFS needs to be restarted first.

unresponsiveWindowDialog.title: GAWOO became unresponsive
unresponsiveWindowDialog.message: Ongoing operation is taking more resources than expected. Do you wish to abort, and forcefully reload the interface?

migrationDialog.title: GAWOO Migration
migrationDialog.message: One moment! GAWOO needs to run the latest data store migrations:

migrationFailedDialog.title: GAWOO Migration Has Failed
migrationFailedDialog.message: IPFS has encountered an error and migration could not be completed:
